professional_summary: Research Technician with expertise in fuel cell systems, automotive testing, and software support.

key_responsibilities: and modifications for fuel cell system
and instrumentation improvements on the fuel cell system test stands.
Produce and modify electrical drawings using Visio 2013.
Provide client support for software designed to assist the podiatric field of medicine.
Train and assist medical staff in using TRAKnet software for ICD10 coding and Meaningful Use requirements.
Monitor project metrics for significant deviations in quality
and tensile testing of automotive components.
Analyze test data and report results using graphs and statistics.
Perform and lead group on connector DV and PV testing.
Manage multiple incoming test projects and establish test timing schedules.
Ensure accurate cost estimates by conducting benchmark studies.

education.institution: National Institute of Technology - Livonia, MI
